column4: not sure whether to ask this here or in postgres, but after sudo /etc/init.d/postgresql-8.4 start I get [OK] but then "psql -Ublah" gives me "psql: could not connect to server: No such file or directory..."
Seems like a psql problem. I would recommend you ask it in their channel for faster help.
hmm okay. i just realized i can run it as the postgres user. does this shed any light on anything?
Never used it, so can't help. Sorry.
